channel.title: Art works on CLyde Zhang
channel.description: Recent content in Art works on CLyde Zhang

item.title: Let's Boat
item.description: Summary A local multiplayer boating game. Each player could control only one paddle from the boat The game’s goal is getting through teamwork to reach the terminus and elude obstacles The game was made by Unity and coding by C# The camera always follows and behind the player’s boat The paddle adds force and torque to the side of the boat to simulate natural boat movement

item.title: Animal Crossing-Turnip Helper
item.description: Summary .meta-media { position: relative; margin-bottom: 30px; display: flex; width: 100%; height: 0; padding-bottom: 75%; } .video { position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; left: 0; top: 0; }

INTRODUCTION 老渔夫是我和朋友们一起制作的一款横版闯关解密游戏，玩家将会在游戏中扮演一个渔夫，使用渔枪在梦境中穿梭，找寻自己失去的记忆并解开困在其心中对于海洋的恐惧。 游戏由三个关卡构成，分别是沙滩、洞窟森林以及海底世界 .meta-media { position: relative; margin-bottom: 30px; display: flex; width: 100%; height: 0; padding-bottom: 75%; } .video { position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; left: 0; top: 0; } 我在团队中主要负责游戏的玩法设计、引擎中的功能实现以及关卡1、2的设计与制作 EDUCATION 09/2016 - 12/2021 College Palomar College San Marcos, CA, U.S. Courses Calculus, Deferential equation ARM/Assembly C# programming Object-Oriented Programming Data Structure .
